mapper.select: select p10_assets_re.* from p10_assets_re where p10_assets_re.project_id=#{projectId} and p10_assets_re.casee_id=#{caseeId} and p10_assets_re.assets_id=#{assetsId}
select p10_assets_re.* from p10_assets_re where p10_assets_re.project_id=#{projectId} and p10_assets_re.casee_id=#{caseeId} and p10_assets_re.assets_id=#{assetsId}

select p10_assets_re.*,p10_target.target_id as assetsTargetId from p10_assets_re left join p10_target on p10_target.goal_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id and p10_assets_re.casee_id = p10_target.casee_id and p10_assets_re.project_id = p10_target.project_id and p10_target.goal_type = 20001 where p10_assets_re.del_flag = 0 and p10_assets_re.assets_re_id = #{assetsReId}

select p10_assets_re.*,p10_address.province,p10_address.city,p10_address.area,p10_address.information_address,p10_assets.assets_name,p10_assets.assets_type,p10_assets.`owner`,p10_assets.account_number from p10_assets_re left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id and p10_address.type = 4 where p10_assets_re.project_id = #{projectId} and p10_assets_re.assets_source = 1

select p10_assets_re.*,p10_assets.*,p10_address.* from p10_assets_re left join p10_assets on p10_assets.assets_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_address on p10_address.user_id=p10_assets.assets_id and p10_address.type=4 left join p10_target on p10_target.project_id = p10_assets_re.project_id and p10_target.casee_id = p10_assets_re.casee_id and p10_target.goal_id = p10_assets_re.assets_id left join p10_task_node on p10_task_node.target_id = p10_target.target_id where p10_assets_re.project_id = #{projectId} and p10_assets_re.`status` = 100 and p10_target.goal_type = 20001 and p10_task_node.node_key = "entityZX_STZX_CCZXSQYS_CCZXSQYS" and ((json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail,'$.mortgagee' ) = 0 and json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail,'$.assetsSeizure.sealUpCondition' ) = 0) or (json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail,'$.mortgagee' ) = 0 and json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail,'$.assetsSeizure.sealUpCondition' ) = 1 and json_extract( p10_task_node.form_data,'$.businessPleaseTransfer' ) = "0") or (json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail,'$.mortgagee' ) = 2 and json_extract( p10_assets_re.assets_re_detail,'$.assetsSeizure.sealUpCondition' ) = 0) )
